TopicTitle: Vote KSP for the Game Developers Choice Audience Award

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/1bbd35297ade744ea719c704e1380b88/tumblr_inline_n1kroj5Sij1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>Hey, everyone!<br/><br/> It’s once again time to rally up the troops. We need your help to win a major prize at the upcoming <strong>Game Developers Choice Awards</strong>. We have been named as one of the nominees for the <strong><a href="http://bit.ly/1o42KFQ" target="_blank">Game Developers Choice Audience Award</a></strong> - an award arguably more prestigious than any other, because the winner is chosen by YOU!<br/><br/> That is why we need YOUR help. We know that we have the best community in all the universe and winning this award will only be a testament to the heights we’ve all risen to together. A vote for <strong><em>KSP</em></strong> is a vote for all of us. You have until March 1st, so make it count!<br/><br/> Click <strong><a href="http://bit.ly/1o42KFQ" target="_blank">HERE</a></strong> to vote.</p>

Voted!

With all of us voting, you're probably gonna win!

WE ARE A STRONG COMMUNITY!!!!!

I really hope KSP wins, but I don't think we will. I mean, think of it. We are going against games like Grand Theft Auto with more players than Minecraft. But once again, like Daniel345 said, KSP has a strong community, which gives us a pretty good advantage.
I voted with my two email address separately so you guys has two vote from me. Ã¢ËœÂº

Dont get me wrong - I love KSP and I will probably vote for it, but competition from big names (Bioshock, GTA) ist huge and there are also some indie gems such as Papers, Please, which really impressed me for a few weeks.

voted, of course

Though I don't know why they put multi million dollar productions like assassins creed on the same list as Indi Gems like KSP and The Stanley Parabel.
Did it! The other games there...pff! You guys, you have deserved it!!!

Voted I hope we can get more people on board

Edited February 27, 2014 by General Pongo
Regarding some of games there, KSP might (should) win quite easily ! I've vote.

I love the David vs Goliath feel to this - Multi-million dollar production games that produced mundane, stale playability vs low budget indie games that provide original gameplay and content. Knock-em down Kavid!
Sorry, were there other games on that list?

Sorry, were there other games on that list?

Yes, and some excellent ones at that. I almost voted for The Stanley Parable. Almost.

Communications status AOK from Minmus 13:

"Civic Duty: Check."
